value.stringValue: Id, Name, Title, Account.Name, LFPID__c, Correspondence_Address__c, Total_Attended_Conferences_Only__c, Total_Attended_CoSpon_Only__c, Future_Conferences__c, Most_Recent_Attended_Date__c

Flow.description: Allows users to easily add contacts and leads to a selected conference. Currently campaign members with the Status "Suggested" will be pulled every few minutes and pushed into the legacy database.

formulas.name: dateMostRecentConf_Contact
formulas.expression: IF( ISBLANK({!addContactsToCMList.Most_Recent_Attended_Date__c}), "Has not recently attended a conference", "Most recently attended a conference on " & TEXT({!addContactsToCMList.Most_Recent_Attended_Date__c}) )

Flow.interviewLabel: Send Suggested Leads & Contacts to Campaign v3 {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Send Suggested Leads & Contacts to Campaign v3

fields.name: confirmCMInsertSuccess
fields.fieldText: You have successfully added {!countInsertCMList} Suggested Conferees to {!getConferenceDetails.Program_Number_Name__c}. It may take up to 5 minutes for the data to appear in the Core Conference database.

fields.name: confirmChatterPostSuccess
fields.fieldText: You successfully added additional suggestion notes in Salesforce for {!countCMUpdates} existing Suggested Conferees. You can view those immediately from the Conference participation list.

fields.name: closeFlowInstructions
fields.fieldText: Click below to close this page or view Conference details and participants.

fields.name: displaySelectedConfDetails
fields.fieldText:
Please confirm that you would like to send Suggested Conferees to the Core Conference database for the following conference:


{!getConferenceDetails.Program_Number_Name__c}

{!getConferenceDetails.Site_City_State_Country__c}

{!getConferenceDetails.StartDate} - {!getConferenceDetails.EndDate}

{!getConferenceDetails.Fellow_Co_Spon__c}


Once you confirm, you will be able to add notes for each suggested conferee.

fields.name: invalidConfMsg
fields.fieldText:
Participants may not be suggested for the selected conference. Either the conference is not identified as a Core Conference in Salesforce, or the start date has passed.


Click Previous to select a different campaign or Cancel to return to your participant list.

fields.name: missingRecordsMsg_listViewButton
fields.fieldText:
You must select at least one contact before adding conferee suggestions.


Click Cancel to return to the previous page. Make sure to check the boxes to the left of each individual you want to suggest before clicking the Suggest Conferees button.

fields.name: missingRecordsMsg_TopicSearch
fields.fieldText:
No contacts were found tagged with the selected topic.


Click Previous to return to select a different topic/tag or Cancel to return to the previous page. Ensure that you have added your topic/tag in the Chatter Topics section of your desired leads and contacts before continuing.

fields.name: contactDetails_Insert
fields.fieldText:
{!addContactsToCMList.Name}

{!addContactsToCMList.Account.Name}

{!addContactsToCMList.Title}

LFPID {!addContactsToCMList.LFPID__c}


Current Address

{!addContactsToCMList.Correspondence_Address__c}


Conference Attendence

Has attended {!countCoreAttendance_Contact} Core conferences

Has attended {!countCoSpoAttendance_Contact} Co-Spo conferences

Is scheduled to attend {!countFutureAttendance_Contact} upcoming (Core & Co-Spo) conferences

{!dateMostRecentConf_Contact}

fields.name: Remove_from_Suggested_Conferee_list_Contact
fields.helpText: If you check this box, this contact will not be added as a suggested conferee for {!getConferenceDetails.Program_Number_Name__c} in the Core Conference database.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please limit your notes to 255 characters, including spaces. You are currently using {!lengthSuggestionNotes_Contact} characters.

fields.name: contactDetails_Update
fields.fieldText:
{!addContactsToCMList.Name}

{!addContactsToCMList.Account.Name}

{!addContactsToCMList.Title}

LFPID {!addContactsToCMList.LFPID__c}


Current Address

{!addContactsToCMList.Correspondence_Address__c}


Conference Attendence

Has attended {!countCoreAttendance_Contact} Core conferences

Has attended {!countCoSpoAttendance_Contact} Co-Spo conferences

Is scheduled to attend {!countFutureAttendance_Contact} upcoming (Core & Co-Spo) conferences

{!dateMostRecentConf_Contact}


This contact has already been suggested for this conference{!namePriorSuggester_Contact}. Would you like to add a note to the existing suggestion?

textTemplates.name: additionalSuggestionContent_Contact
textTemplates.text: {!addContactsToCMList.Name} is also recommended by {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.FirstName} on {!$Flow.CurrentDate} with the following note: {!Additional_Suggestion_Note_Contact}

variables.description: Used when records are passed into the flow from a Visualforce/list view button on lead or contact
variables.name: ids

variables.description: Used to indicate whether the flow is called from a lead list view or a contact list view
variables.name: listViewSource
